description: Clayton County police said they had been shot on Lundy Lane.
title: Cops ID men found dead in middle of Clayton County street
title_page: Cops ID men found dead in middle of Clayton County street
text:
Police in Clayton County are investigating a weekend shooting that left two men dead.
They were called to Lundy Lane in Jonesboro, near the intersection of Kendrick Road, just before 10:45 p.m. Saturday after gunfire was reported in the area, police spokeswoman Sgt. Ashanti Marbury said.
When police arrived, they found Ronald Triche III, 22, of Fayetteville, and Nikko Sepulveda, 26, of Jonesboro, in the middle of Lundy Lane, Marbury said. Each had been shot.
Ronald Triche's mother minutes before my live shot. She wants her son's killer to turn himself in. Police have no suspects, no leads. pic.twitter.com/OtFbYmxlC6 â€” Chris Jose (@ChrisJoseWSB) April 24, 2017
There are no suspects.
If you know anything about the incident, call Crime Stoppers at 404-577-8477.
In other news:
